thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Sonia Garcia

author: Sonia Garcia
title: Sonia Garcia
text: It's not so often I am left this impressed by the efficiency and effectiveness of a business. From the first moment I made contact with Antonio at Flashbay, I received all info I needed to make the right decision. He was the most helpful and went the extra mile to ensure we received the goods on time for our big exhibition. No wonder why this business has such great reviews, this was some top-notch service!
